title: Why You NEED This Planter for Your Container Garden!

tasks.task: Determine how to care for a rubber planter.
subtasks: Find ways to love a Tierra Verde rubber planter.
Identify three reasons for loving the Tierra Verde rubber planter.
Recognize that the planter is made from recycled tires.
Understand the benefit of using recycled tires in the planter.
Acknowledge the planter's unbreakable quality.
Note the giant water reservoir in the planter.
Understand how the water reservoir prevents root rot.
Realize the plant will still receive necessary water despite the reservoir.

tasks.task: Propose alternative uses for recycled tires in agriculture.
subtasks: Consider using recycled tires for planters to reduce landfill waste.
Explore other ways to repurpose tires in agriculture to benefit plants.

tasks.task: Analyze the water management system in a rubber planter.
subtasks: Assess the role of the grate in the water reservoir.
Determine how the water reservoir prevents root rot while allowing plants to access necessary water.
